scripts.deps: for filename in node_modules/ace-editor-builds/src-min-noconflict/ace.js node_modules/ace-editor-builds/src-min-noconflict/mode-javascript.js node_modules/core-js/client/shim.min.js node_modules/zone.js/dist/zone.min.js node_modules/reflect-metadata/Reflect.js  node_modules/lodash/lodash.min.js node_modules/benchmark/benchmark.js; do cat "${filename}"; echo;  done > dist/deps.js
scripts.uglify: uglifyjs dist/temp/rollup/bundle.js --output dist/bundle.min.js --source-map dist/bundle.min.js.map --source-map-url bundle.min.js.map --in-source-map dist/temp/rollup/bundle.js.map --screw-ie8 --compress --mangle
scripts.build: npm run clean && ngc && rollup -c && npm run deps && npm run uglify:deps && npm run uglify
